alert.note: Alert for Darke; Preble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:50AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN WAYNE, NORTHWESTERN PREBLE AND SOUTHWESTERN DARKE COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM EDT... At 650 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located over Richmond, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Richmond, New Paris, New Madison, Eldorado, Spring Grove and Middleboro. This includes the following Interstates... I-70 in Indiana between mile markers 151 and 156. I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 0 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
